mapper.insert: insert into course3.takes(semester, year, courseId, userName, grade, gpa, teacherUserName) values (#{semester},#{year},#{courseId},#{userName},#{grade},#{gpa},#{teacherUserName})
mapper.delete: delete from course3.takes where courseId = #{courseId} and semester = #{semester} and year = #{year} and userName = #{userName} and teacherUserName = #{teacherUserName}
